author: cbs8
title: CAD Market in the Automotive Sector in EMEA 2015-2019
text:
ReportBuyer
LONDON , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About CAD
CAD is an effective and efficient tool for modeling and designing products and components with ease and accuracy. These solutions enable end-users to digitally prototype their products before production. They help engineers, architects, and other design professionals draft industry-specific products to enhance the development of products. CAD solutions are widely adopted by several industries such as automotive, aerospace and defense, industrial machinery, electrical and electronics, and others. These solutions enable end-users to digitally prototype their products before production.
Technavio's analysts forecast the CAD market in the automotive sector in EMEA to grow at a CAGR of 4.29% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
The CAD market in the automotive sector in EMEA can be segmented into two product segments: 2D CAD and 3D CAD.
Technavio's report, CAD Market in the Automotive Sector in EMEA 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers EMEA; it also covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market.
